item.title: Analyzing Inpatient Data From the Hospital Charge Data Set
item.description: Letâ€™s examine the Hospital Charge Dataset from data.gov I wanted to analyse this dataset because I wanted to know how charges vary among providers. Let me show you one row of the dataset (it has been split into two lines) DRG Definition Provider Id Provider Name Provider Street Address Provider City Provider State Provider Zip Code Hospital Referral Region Descri 039 -EXTRACRANIAL PROCEDURES W/O CC OR MCC 10001 SOUTHEAST ALABAMA MEDICAL CENTER 1108 ROSS CLARK CIR DOTHAN AL 36301 AL - Dothan Total Discharges Average Covered Charges Average Total Payments Average Medicare Payments 91 $32963.
